comment: Sludge quality observed schema adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.WaterQuality/master/SludgeQualityObserved/schema.json
description: Sludge Quality data model is intended to represent sludge quality parameters.

contents.name: AOX
contents.comment: Property. Concentration of Adsorbable Organically bound halogens (AOX). Units:'mg/Kg SS'

contents.name: As
contents.comment: Property. Arsenic. Concentration of arsenic. Units:'mg/Kg SS'

contents.name: B
contents.comment: Property. Boron. Concentration of boron. Units:'mg/Kg SS'

contents.name: Be
contents.comment: Property. Beryllium. Concentration of Beryllium. Units:'mg/Kg SS'

contents.name: C-ORG
contents.comment: Property. Organic Carbon. Concentration of organic carbon. Units:'percentage of SS (min)'

contents.name: C10-C40
contents.comment: Property. Concentration of Hydrocarbons C10-C40. Units:'mg/Kg SS'

contents.name: Cd
contents.comment: Property. Cadmium. Concentration of cadmium. Units:'mg/Kg SS'

contents.name: Cr
contents.comment: Property. Chromium. Concentration of chromium. Units:'mg/Kg SS'

contents.name: Cr-VI
contents.comment: Property. Chromium VI. Concentration of chromium at the oxidation state +6. Units:'mg/Kg SS'

contents.name: Cu
contents.comment: Property. Copper. Concentration of copper. Units:'mg/Kg SS'

contents.name: DEHP
contents.comment: Property. Diethylhexyl phthalate. Concentration of DEHP. Units:'mg/Kg SS'

contents.name: Hg
contents.comment: Property. Mercury. Concentration of mercury. Units:'mg/Kg SS'

contents.name: IPA
contents.comment: Property. Sum of isopropyl alcohol Sum of content of isopropyl alcohol. Units:'mg/Kg SS'

contents.name: K-TOT
contents.comment: Property. Total potassium. Total content of potassium. Units:'percentage of SS (min)'

contents.name: N-TOT
contents.comment: Property. Total Nitrogen. Total Nitrogen (TN) is the sum of nitrate-nitrogen (NO3-N), nitrite-nitrogen (NO2-N), ammonia-nitrogen (NH3-N) and organically bonded nitrogen. Units:'percentage of SS (min)'

contents.name: Ni
contents.comment: Property. Nickel. Concentration of Nickel. Units:'mg/Kg SS'

contents.name: P-TOT
contents.comment: Property. Total Phosphorus. Total phosphorus is a measure of all forms of phosphorus in the water, including dissolved and particulate, organic and inorganic. Units:'percentage of SS (min)'

contents.name: PCB
contents.comment: Property. Polychlorinated biphenyls Concentration of polychlorinated biphenyls. Units:'mg/Kg SS'

contents.name: Se
contents.comment: Property. Selenium. Concentration of selenium. Units:'mg/Kg SS'

contents.name: Zn
contents.comment: Property. Zinc. Concentration of zinc. Units:'mg/Kg SS'

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: dateObserved
contents.comment: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. The date and time of this observation in ISO8601 UTCformat. It can be represented by an specific time instant or by an ISO8601 interval.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: faecal-coliforms
contents.comment: Property. Concentration of fecal coliforms (Most Probable Number per gram solids). Units:'MPN/g SS (max)'

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item

contents.name: pH
contents.comment: Property. Acidity or basicity of an aqueous solution.

contents.name: salmonella
contents.comment: Property. Concentration of Salmonella (Most Probable Number per gram solids). Units:'MPN/g SS (max)'

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object

contents.name: toluene
contents.comment: Property. Concentration of Toluene. Units:'mg/Kg SS'

contents.name: measurand
contents.comment: Property. An array of strings containing details (see format below) about extra measurands provided by this observation.

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
